ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c = FALSE, NOT( VLOOKUP( $ObjectType.HRCFSL_SWORD__c.Fields.HRCFSL_Allow_Tech_Gen__c, $ObjectType.HRCFSL_SWORD__c.Fields.Name, HRCFSL_SWORD_ID__c)), ISNEW(), $Profile.Name!= 'HRC Service Agent')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Work Type cannot be created in this application, please contact the call center.
